articles.title: Lion DNA convicts poachers in world first
articles.description: Investigators reveal how they were able to identify a missing animal using a database of lions in Zimbabwe.

articles.title: Rahul Dravid Picks His Preferred T20 World Cup Finalists: 'Zimbabwe Vs...'
articles.description: Rahul Dravid hopes for an India versus Zimbabwe 2026 T20 World Cup final!

articles.title: Cecil: The Lion And The Dentist review: This heartbreaking documentary proves the global trophy hunting backlash achieved NOTHING - and will fill you with blind rage
articles.description: Thought to be the world's biggest lion at the time, Cecil, with his unusual black mane, was the star of the show at the Hwange National Park in Zimbabwe.
